Articles.Content:
Hill turns into a bookcase.

Shelvish Hill. (new page. yay)

**Edited <time datetime="2021-10-24T12:43:55Z" title="10/24/2021 12:43  PM" data-short="2 yr">October 24, 2021</time> by ColdJ**

Takes the books.

**My Bookcase hill**

You must keep your bookcase.

Bookkeeper Hill

\*\*

P.S.  

Unexpectedly.

Which English word contains "ookkee" inside?
Godzilla comes destroys Hill my titanium hill

Cookie Monster says Cookkee.

There you go Kerbiloid. (bet you thought I'd say Bookkeeper ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)") )

My yummy hill.
Myyumy Beach next to it.

Hill +1

No Negatives can take it now. Only Positive Comrades.

I'm positive about my life and i take the hill for myself. Now it is...

**MY HILL**

I'm also a positive comrade, so I add +1 to the hill.

My hill.

As 2 negatives make a positive.

It is not not my hill.

I go to sleep on my hill.

My hill.

Ssh! He's sleeping. Silence, please!

Silent Hill

Silence must fall.

I saw the hill,but when I turned around I forgot.

Forgotten Hill.

Idk what had you gotten, but let it be so.

For Gotten Hill

Surprise, Gotten is actually a fake ID of mine, so that means that i get the hill! Mwahaha!

**MY HILL**

Huh?

MY HILL
Huhhill

I use the quicksave option to go back to when the hill was just a normal hill and plant a flag on it.

My hill.

I make a new hill.

My  new hill.

F5
Hillmaker Hill
I make a small army on my hill.

I use a VERY large "tonk" (how large? IDK, as big as you want) to evaporate the army. The tonk sits there to this millisecond...

![images?q=tbn:ANd9GcQ-FGvFGiE33osRqKnIhSK](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcQ-FGvFGiE33osRqKnIhSKfyG_rrWtrLoYKpw&usqp=CAU)

My burning, tonk covered hill.

**Edited <time datetime="2021-10-26T23:28:24Z" title="10/26/2021 11:28  PM" data-short="2 yr">October 26, 2021</time> by Dirkidirk**

Someone is preparing an army? Well then. Here we go. We mobilize.....

![1301753.jpg](https://cdn.images.express.co.uk/img/dynamic/78/750x445/1301753.jpg)

50 Infantry Battalions (each with 50,000 soilders)...

![1200px-Arjun_MK1A_field_trials.jpg](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/b/b7/Arjun_MK1A_field_trials.jpg/1200px-Arjun_MK1A_field_trials.jpg)

And 20 tanks forces...

On my hill.

Hill collapses under the weight.

My crater.
Concave Hill
